detail_desc: Jumper in a soft cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves in a relaxed fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper knitted in supersoft chenille with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with glitter. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener, and braided jute trims around the soles. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.

Blouse in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Body in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, wide shoulder straps and a low-cut back. Lined gusset with press-studs.
Straight-cut coat in a soft weave with notch lapels, a one-button fastening, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, frill-trimmed side pockets and tapered legs. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a belt in a sturdy weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button and fake pockets. Belt with a metal buckle and imitation leather details.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in patterned, softly draping satin made partly from recycled polyester with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Wide, covered elastication at the waist and wide, gently flared legs with sewn-in creases down the front and sturdier side panels with decorative stitching.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves with elastication around the top and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Body in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Jacket in a printed cotton weave with a collar, zip down the front and welt front pockets. Covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with elastication at the back of the waist,diagonal side pockets and flounce-trimmed straps with adjustable buttoning at the front.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Length 55-70 cm.
Hat in a soft, chunky knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a small appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a seam with a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Partly lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Warm-lined hi-tops in denim and imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, gently fitted top in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neckline and rounded hem.
Cap in a cotton weave with an embroidered appliqué at the front. Unlined.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Straight-cut top in sweatshirt fabric with decorative ball chains, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery, a round neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the top, and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Lace playsuit with a V-neck and super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and racer back.

Fully lined sports bralette in ribbed microfibre with wide ribbing at the hem and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a ribbed neckline and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Patterned stud earrings in metal and plastic. Size 1 cm.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch dobby weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Low-cut neckline and slits in the sides.
Cropped top in jersey with long sleeves, a ribbed neckline and raw-edge, rolled hem.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Ribbed V-neck top in airy jersey with a slight sheen, narrow shoulder straps and lace trims around the neckline and hem.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front. Leather linings and insoles.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side and back pockets.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in velour with a matching hat. Dress with appliqués on the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Opening with a hook and loop fastener at the back and faux fur trims around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with wide elastication at the back of the waist, a wide sewn-on tie belt at the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a decorative knot detail on each shoulder strap and a print motif. Shorts with side pockets and covered elastication at the waist.
Imitation suede sandals with covered block heels. Foot straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved, calf-length dress in embroidered mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Fully lined swimsuit with removable inserts and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a striped, printed viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Bustier in washed, stretch denim with a sweetheart neckline, a zip down the front and a seam at the hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked bodice and square neckline with concealed elastication and a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the hems, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
